website_summaries.verdict: A newer model by a popular brand that offers a durable build and reliable features for a mid-range price.
pros: This updated model features a rugged Kohler engine that's known to start on the first try
Has front-wheel drive and self-propelled power that makes it easy to operate on most terrain
cons: A new release means that possible issues may come out after more consumers have experience using it
Not as powerful for uphill use as AWD

customer_reviews.title: I thought this company would have a good lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: This is the second lawn mower we received. The first one, the front wheel drive would not work after two cuts. We had to remove the gas and oil and returned. So, we got another one, same model, same problem. After cutting the front lawn the front wheel drive would not work. I thought this company would have a good lawn mower, so now I will try a different company. Don't buy this lawn mower.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Grosch

customer_reviews.title: Great mower! Don't buy the junk at the big box stores!
customer_reviews.text: Great mower. Easy to set up and start it on the first pull. Cuts awesome and the self propelled feature works great too. I couldn't be happier another great product made in our country thank you Husqvarna.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Starts on the first pull EVERY TIME!
customer_reviews.text: This mower is the cats meow! It runs perfect and everytime I start it, it starts on the first pull....I love that I don't have to prime it and just walk behind it and it does all the work. Its powerful, cuts my lawn and I don't even use the bag as it mulches all the grass and it looks like a professional did it. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: margaret egan

customer_reviews.title: Self propel stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The self propel stopped working after about 7 mowings no more warranty or way to get any help to fix it. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this mower for one season...after someone was nice enough to steal my other mower. After shopping around I decided on Husqvarna. It comes with everything you need, including bag, discharge chute and without the chute, it's a mulcher. Front wheel drive is nice, too. This mower has everything my stolen mower has, but it's easier to use, if you can believe that.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great mover. I only buy Husqvarna
customer_reviews.text: Great mover. I only buy Husqvarna. The oil bottle was busted in the delvery box and there was oil everywhere. It took me longer to wipe down eveything than it took asseble the mover. There wasn't any assembly instruction's or operating instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best push mower!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband during Amazon’s Prime specials. He used in the first time this evening (8/13/18). When he was through, he came in and said “This is the best push mower I have ever used”! We have went through a lot of push mowers, some very expensive! I am glad we got this one. Husqvarna will be our brand we buy from now on.
customer_reviews.author: S. Case

customer_reviews.title: The lawnmower was sent back and amazon had a replacement sent right away which this one worked great no issues cuts grass great love the self propelled ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received the first delivery the lawnmower had broken parts on it, The plastic handle on the bottom to adjust the push bar and the plastic shroud were the pull handle comes out was also broke. But the box was not damaged, The lawnmower was sent back and amazon had a replacement sent right away which this one worked great no issues cuts grass great love the self propelled and the lawnmower mower is very easy to start fires right up 1st pull..
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: A bit scary buying a lawn mower on line but took the plunge. Have been using it now for about a month and it is a good machine. Could use it right out of the box and it's the perfect size mower for our smaller, flat lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: Good mower for the money.
customer_reviews.text: A good quality mower that is made well. Well worth the money and I like the water hose attachment for cleaning the under deck.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase. Had it for about a month
customer_reviews.text: A good purchase. Had it for about a month. Started on the first pull and every one since. Occasional smoke on start, but doesn't seem to consume oil.
customer_reviews.author: timepilot

customer_reviews.title: Would have liked replacement part sent but could not figure out how to get one from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Product is great - but arrived damaged. Wing nut broken in half that holds the handle. Had to purchase a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great mower for the price
customer_reviews.text: Mower arrived a day after purchase. Assembly took about 15 minutes and it fired up on first pull. I mowed right away and actually enjoyed it. Can't believe I can get a mower like this for this price. Other places were trying to sell me on 400 to 500 mowers...I don't see how those could have been any better for what I need. Very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Magyera

customer_reviews.title: poorly made, not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in spring 2020 as a treat to myself and to update my older self-propelled Huskvarna (with a Honda engine). Big mistake. Significant amount of the undercarriage is plastic, lightweight, flimsy. The trajectory & velocity of the clipping chute into the bag causes clouds of dust to travel through the bag and cover the operator. Now at 6 months old, it cranks and immediately shuts off. Waiting on directions for authorized repair shop but in the meantime I'm using my original Huskvarna from 2012 which runs fine, despite 8 years of wear and tear. This model has been a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cook

customer_reviews.title: Very good mower for price!
customer_reviews.text: Received it less than 24 hours. Very easy to assemble just 4 knobs to tighten on handle. Started first pull. Handle has two positions that can be installed for taller or shorter individuals. Very satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: fred h

customer_reviews.title: Self propel stopped working after four mows
customer_reviews.text: The self propel function suddenly stopped working. Very frustrating. I could have bought a cheaper mower with no self propel function
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great LAWNMOWER! Great service!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son, he LOVES it, came completely ready to use, is very well built, customer service and price were top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Howell

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cut grass on hill. My Husquavarna sit down and all my husquavarna tools have been exceptional for over 12 years.
customer_reviews.author: MAC 1313

customer_reviews.title: Starts on first Pull
customer_reviews.text: This is good little mower but it bogs down a lot cutting my grass. Today is the 2nd time i have cut my grass and it did not bog down. I raised the cutting height of the mower and I am hoping this solved the problem
customer_reviews.author: Ronp30014

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Aug 27 2018, didn’t use mower until April 2019. Since April I’ve used mower a total of 5 times, on fourth time the belt for front drive came off. Put belt back on used mower on front yard and then went to do backyard and now this fairly new mower won’t start. Very very disappointing. I guess I won’t purchase any lawn equipment again!
customer_reviews.author: Gaylon L Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Mower came fast and started on first pull. Runs great
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Was worth the money.. got it at the beginning of summer still starts on the first pull and works great.. only thing I don't really like is how it blows the grass out the back and then to the side . but I can live with that
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Belt will not stay on!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Using mower for FIRST full mowing season. Cuts excellent but what good is that if the belt comes off continually? Have put belt back on at least a dozen times (pain in the a..). For the price paid it would seem like this relatively new mower shouldn't have this problem. Stay away from Husqvarna
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad maneuverability and pull string is poorly attached
customer_reviews.text: The pull string for mine was poorly attached and snapped after about a month. This mower is very difficult to move through terrain that isn’t perfectly flat ( and i just mean even slightly bumpy ground is hard to move past ). This is a problem i have not had with other mowers and would not recommend getting this unless your yard is extremely flat.
customer_reviews.author: Ayman Muntaser

customer_reviews.title: very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: THE MOWER START ON FIRST PULL ON ROPE. THE MOWER CUT THE GRASS VERY GOOD. I WOLD BUY THIS MOWER AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Martin dugas

customer_reviews.title: Came Broken
customer_reviews.text: Product came either dropped or hit with forklift. I am sure it did not leave the factory like these. The product is 80 pounds I could see 1 person dropping it. Will update after replacement comes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: Love the front-wheel drive. Starts effortlessly. This is by far the best lawnmower I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: TomM

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works like a lawnmower should I don’t think it’s as fast as the rear wheel drive but it cuts grass and that’s all I need.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby like the power and ease the way it works. He uses it for the front yard.
customer_reviews.author: Tinamarie Billings

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the miney
customer_reviews.text: Love the mower but I bag my grass n it's kinda hard to take it in n off its tricky
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The front wheel drive is already malfunctioning after about 2 months, it now stays on all the time. Also if I stop the mower, it does not always start again right away. Sometimes I had to wait a few minutes for it to start again. I have to say I am disappointed in this mower.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great mower for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Runs great, starts right up with no issues and having self propel is a must on a half acre. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Propel stopped working after limited use.
customer_reviews.text: Self propel stopped working after 5 uses. The nut fell out so I had to get a new one but when putting it back in, the handle is now bent. It’s pretty much useless so I bought a Honda. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Crooked
customer_reviews.text: Steers to the right and can’t figure out why but otherwise works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine and Value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, easy to put together (15 minutes), and starts every time with 1 pull, and a great value to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this lawnmower, it came all together so very little assembly required, and it cuts the gas great, the self propel is super fast!
customer_reviews.author: anni sherman

customer_reviews.title: Very good mower choice
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in a snap. Maneuvering is easy and front wheel drive works well. Pretty quiet for a gas mower. Overall very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.author: jtrdiddy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, pictures were clear
customer_reviews.text: when the grass is thick and long, and used on sloping yard, front power wheels should have a thicker texture more like the tires on a dirt bike in order to get traction. Works well when the grass is already mown.
customer_reviews.author: James Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great mower. Starts first try every time. Easy to use and makes mowing a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: The mower gets stuck in forward , should have send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far great. Works like great and easy to start
customer_reviews.author: Pam Logan

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my father. He absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: Sonora

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good machine I give it to my brother as a gift and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Leopoldo Montagnerl

customer_reviews.title: Great reliability for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy start. Self propelled is great. Nice cut and great manuvabilty.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mower
customer_reviews.text: Read some bad reviews about this mower, the only bad thing that I can think of is, why didn't I get it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Litten

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Reliable one pull start. The rear discharge leaves no grass clumps. The Kohler engine is better than expected
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Very low handle!  Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: If you are over 5’ tall, do not buy this mower. It will hurt your back because the handle is very low and not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Mumme

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had a broken wingnut that attaches the handle. It has not been replaced by seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the front we'll drive belt came off on the third use.
customer_reviews.author: CDS

customer_reviews.title: The parts are plastic what a shame to place the Husqvarna name on such a useless piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This lawnmower is so damn hard to start. The parts are plastic what a shame to place the Husqvarna name on such a useless piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: machine wont strat ,called kohler and the number given was s a company that was out of business.( only used three times)
customer_reviews.text: the mower game with the oil bottle open and it was all over the box and stained the concrete driveway .The machine works fine the shipping was a problem and the stain wont come off the concrete. 8/2/2018 machine wont start only used three times
customer_reviews.author: Sal Sandone

product_meta.title: Husqvarna L121FH, 21 in. 149cc Kohler FWD Walk Behind Lawn Mower
product_meta.description: The Husqvarna LC121FH is a very efficient front wheel drive lawn mower, well suited for flat lawns. The front wheel drive system delivers self-propelled capability combined with desired maneuverability for mowing around obstacles.
feature_bullets: 3-in-1 mulch, collection or side discharge options
21-Inch cutting width. Cutting height adjustment: Four-point, cutting height, maximum (approximate): 3. 44 inch, cutting height, minimum (approximate): 1. 25 inch
High rear wheels boost control and maneuverability
Soft grip handle makes mowing comfortable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars85 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
